channel.title: Stand By Your Band
channel.description: Tom Thakkar and Tommy McNamara talk about the bands that Pitchfork attacks and your friends make fun of. The comics have on guests who love a band that everyone seems to hate, and together they give that band a fair chance.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Tom Thakkar and Tommy McNamara defend the bands that society loves to hate along with passionate guests!
channel.itunes:author: Thomas Thakkar
channel.itunes:summary: Tom Thakkar and Tommy McNamara talk about the bands that Pitchfork attacks and your friends make fun of. The comics have on guests who love a band that everyone seems to hate, and together they give that band a fair chance.

item.title: 4: Yellowcard with Ahri Findling
item.description: Ahri Findling loves Yellowcard and he doesn't care who knows it! He joins Tom and Tommy to show them the way with his playlist. Follow the show at @Standbyyourband and email us at StandByYourBandPod@Gmail.com. Ahri's Yellowcard playlist: Lights and Sounds View From Heaven (Acoustic) Sureshot For Pete's Sake Life of a Salesman Gifts and Curses
item.dc:creator: Thomas Thakkar

item.title: 3: Incubus with Greta Rose Titelman
item.description: Greta Rose Titelman (Lady Lovin' Podcast) joins Tom and Tommy to talk about Incubus! Teenage angst, virginity, Brandon Boyd's confusingly hot bod, and more in this ep! Check out Greta on Twitter at @Gertie_Bird and e-mail us at StandByYourBandPod@Gmail.com with questions and comments! You can find Greta's Incubus playlist on Tom Thakkar's Spotify, or find them yourself! 1. Nice To Know You 2. Wish You Were Here 3. Circles 4. Aqueous Transmission 5. The Warmth 6. Are You In? Rate and review us on iTunes and we'll love you forever!

item.title: 2: ABBA with Joe Kwaczala
item.description: Joe Kwaczala (Clickhole, Onion News Network) comes all the way from Los Angeles, CA to defend the Swedish Sensation, ABBA! Despite ABBA's giant success, we find many people who don't respect them, and Joe shows Tom and Tommy what we've all forgotten, to stand by ABBA. You can see Joe's ABBA playlist on Tom Thakkar's Spotify, or find the songs yourself! 1. Gimme! Gimme! Gimme! 2. The Winner Takes it All 3. Ring Ring 4. Love Isn't Easy 5. Waterloo 6. Knowing Me, Knowing You Rate and review on iTunes and we'll love you forever!

item.title: 1: Matchbox 20 with Jack Comstock
item.description: Stand By Your Band kicks off with a band that has been named in the top 20 worst bands on several lists! Jack Comstock joins Tom Thakkar and Tommy McNamara to discuss his love for them! You can get his playlist on Tom Thakkar's Spotify, or find the songs yourself! 1. Back 2 Good 2. Mad Season 3. Shame 4. Busted 5. Could I Be You 6. Downfall Send us your faves at StandByYourBandPod@gmail.com or tweet us at @StandByYourBand! Special thanks to Mike Carozza and Bob Nugent for music and our logo respectively!
